name: Trijam #1 - Soft Bra (theme)
description:
This is our first game for Trijam - a 3 hour game jam that we organize every Saturday. If you want to participate, you are most welcome.

The theme for this game jam was "Soft Bra". We pick the theme randomly.

Timelapse of the development of this game:

We stream the development process here:

https://www.twitch.tv/rocknightstudios/
